page.title: 15THE GROWTH AREA OF WORTHING
page.content: Durrington is a very recent area, because there is the Fleetwning Estate which is only 15 years old.There are quite a few shopping areas,such as Tesco's supermarket which is very popular.It is a very small place but is still growing.There are the Nissan Headquarters(car manufacturers)in West Durrington.Before,the Fleetwing Ewtate was a rubbish tip but was built over in 1970.The school are for children from 4-12 years.The library is small, but adequate.There are bungalows, semi-detatched houses,and detatched houses.There is only one bank,and a post office.By the supermarket there are other shops. Altogether,I think that this area is quite nice to live in.
